website_summaries.verdict: Everything you need to keep your hard floors clean in one package - mop, self-wringing bucket, and replacement heads.
pros: Complete mop system with wringer basket and soap dispenser
Mop includes three microfiber heads that are machine washable
cons: Some durability concerns of the mop handle with regular use

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many spin mop products and by far this is the one that works the best. Owning my own cleaning business this is a major factor. I have sent back Mopnado total junk fell apart as well as one I recently purchased another smaller version of Mopnado different company. This is the best and ease of use and I like the rectangle bucket. You push it around with your mop handle there is no handle attached to drag it. It has a nice sturdy handle to carry it around. Will purchase again. Thank you so much for a great product!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: This product is exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was skeptical that this mop would be as good as advertised. I WAS WRONG! I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!!! It's innovative, easy to assemble, light weight (but sturdy). The 3 mop heads that are included all work really well. I have travertine floors, and am very picky about how they are cleaned. The microfiber mop heads are soft, non abrasive & clean really well. The spin system is ingenious, & I can't believe how effective and easy it is to use. Having the cleaning dispenser in the bucket is so convenient. Compared to other mop & buckets I've purchased over the years this is by far the best, & definitely my favorite. I would ABSOLUTELY recommend this item.

customer_reviews.text: I love the bucket has wheels and it is easy to spin the excess water out of the mop however the handle is flimsy and came apart while I was mopping. I feel it could be made better for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Swenson

customer_reviews.title: I don't like this product
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this product. The handle continually detaches and one must manually adjust the mop head before putting it in the bucket to spin it then manually reposition the head when mopping. I like the lower priced foot pedal design much better. I cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID MATSUKIYO

customer_reviews.title: On Wheels
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good, the water jilts very does is very easy to use, but also has the wheel not to need to carry, has the wheel to pull down to be good.
customer_reviews.author: lena lin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love this spin mop! The pump for soap makes updating the water easy and the wheels and light (but balanced) weight design makes working around my house easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Warner

customer_reviews.title: Great mop!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent quality. Just make sure you assemble the handle as directed or it won't work. (I figured that out later.) Other than my oversight, it is a very nice mop. I wish it had two buckets for clean and dirty soap.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mopping system. Everything in the description is accurate. I may be purchasing some of these for Christmas gifts. Can't go wrong with this purchase. The little bottle for the cleaning solution isn't really necessary, but nice. This is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie
